data.name: The Wraith of the Galaxy
data.detailed_description:
The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game.

The player will control a spaceship equipped with several types of weapons. Destroy mutants, asteroids, explore new planets.


The Story

Aliens have taken over outer space in order to conduct experiments on entire planets. Destroy them or they will destroy you.




Game Features:

1) Colorful and stunning space views
2) Various enemies
3) Several types of weapons
4) Spaceship with controls like in flight simulators
5) 6 interesting missions
6) Mesmerizing soundtrack

data.short_description: The Wraith of the Galaxy is a third-person space combat game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5500 GB available space
